description: Police say a man is alleged to have taken a photo in changing rooms at a Redhill shopping centre.
title: Surrey Police appeal after Redhill changing room voyeurism report
title_page: Surrey Police appeal after Redhill changing room voyeurism report - BBC News
maintext:
Police are appealing for help to identify a man after a woman reported seeing a person taking a photo over a changing room cubicle.
Surrey Police said the alleged voyeurism offence happened in H&M in the Belfry Shopping Centre in Redhill on 9 January between 13:30 GMT and 13:50.
Police have shared a CCTV image of a man they believe may be able to help with their investigation.
Anyone who recognises the person in the image, or who has information which could help police, is asked to contact the force.
